translated: by attending to the superior, one attains excellence.

original: de phyir bdag pas gtsor gyur bsten par bya //
analyzed: de phyir bdag pas gtsor gyur bsten par bya //
translated: Therefore, one should attend to those who are superior to oneself.

original: tshul khrims nye bar zhi /
analyzed: tshul khrims nye bar zhi /
translated: Those who are disciplined,

original: ba dang // shes rab ches mchog ldan pa yi //🔽gtso bo gang yin de bsten na //
analyzed: ba dang // shes rab ches mchog ldan pa yi // gtso bo gang yin de bsten na //
translated: endowed with the highest wisdom,🔽by attending to the superior,

original: gtso bo bas kyang ches gtsor 'gyur //
analyzed: gtso bo bas kyang ches gtsor 'gyur //
translated: one becomes even more superior.

original: mi yis 'di na nya rul la //
analyzed: mi yis 'di na nya rul la //
translated: If a person ties a rotting fish

original: ku sha'i gtsang byed bcings pa gang //
analyzed: ku sha'i gtsang byed bcings pa gang //
translated: with a purifying kusha grass,

original: ku sha nyid kyang rul 'gyur ba //
analyzed: ku sha nyid kyang rul 'gyur ba //
translated: even the kusha itself will rot;

original: sdig pa bsten pa'ang de bzhin 'gyur //🔽mi yis rgya spos pa la sha'i //
analyzed: sdig pa bsten pa'ang de bzhin 'gyur // mi yis rgya spos pa la sha'i //
translated: so it is with attending to the sinful.🔽If a person makes a fan

original: lo mar phur ma byas pa gang //
analyzed: lo mar phur ma byas pa gang //
translated: of the leaves of agarwood and palm,

original: lo ma nyid kyang dri zhim pa //
analyzed: lo ma nyid kyang dri zhim pa //
translated: And the leaves themselves are fragrant.

original: dam pa bsten pa'ang de bzhin 'gyur //
analyzed: dam pa bsten pa'ang de bzhin 'gyur //
translated: It is the same when you rely on holy beings.🔽If you rely on a nonvirtuous person,

original: gal te sdig pa byed pa dag / sdig mi byed pas bsten na yang //
analyzed: gal te sdig pa byed pa dag / sdig mi byed pas bsten na yang //
translated: even if you are virtuous,

original: sdig pa byed par dogs skye zhing //
analyzed: sdig pa byed par dogs skye zhing //
translated: you will be suspected of nonvirtue,

original: mi snyan pa yang 'phel bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mi snyan pa yang 'phel bar 'gyur //
translated: and your own virtue will diminish.

original: bsten bya ma yin bsten pa'i mi //
analyzed: bsten bya ma yin bsten pa'i mi //
translated: The person who relies on the unreliables

original: de yi skyon gyis skyon can 'gyur //🔽dong par dug bskus mda' bcug pas //
analyzed: de yi skyon gyis skyon can 'gyur // dong par dug bskus mda' bcug pas //
translated: will be tainted by their faults.🔽An arrow dipped in poison

original: dug ma bskus pa'ang gos pa bzhin //
analyzed: dug ma bskus pa'ang gos pa bzhin //
translated: will spread the poison wherever it goes.🔽Therefore, do not associate with the sinful

original: brten pa skyon gos 'jigs pa dag / sdig pa can dang bshes mi bya //
analyzed: brten pa skyon gos 'jigs pa dag / sdig pa can dang bshes mi bya //
translated: for fear of being tainted by their faults.🔽Whatever kind of person you rely on,

original: ji ltar grogs po bsten pa dang // ji ltar nye bar bsten byas pa ;🔽/ bsten bya de ni ci 'dra bar //
analyzed: ji ltar grogs po bsten pa dang // ji ltar nye bar bsten byas pa ; / bsten bya de ni ci 'dra bar //
translated: and however you rely on them,🔽you will become like that,

original: ring po mi thogs de 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: ring po mi thogs de 'drar 'gyur //
translated: no matter how long it takes.

original: de bas 'bras bu'i snod bzhin du //
analyzed: de bas 'bras bu'i snod bzhin du //
translated: Therefore, like a vessel for your food,

original: bdag gis bsten pa shes pa yis //
analyzed: bdag gis bsten pa shes pa yis //
translated: you should know how to rely on others.

original: dam pa ma yin mi bsten cing //
analyzed: dam pa ma yin mi bsten cing //
translated: Do not rely on the unholy.
